roleset.name: make fatter
roleset.note: FATTEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fatten' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry available at the moment, but it's probably 45.4 "other causative". (from fatten.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: a case for vegetarianism
example.text: Feedlots fatten young cattle for slaughter, so a decline signals a tightening supply of beef.

roleset.name: fatten to a fully fat state
roleset.note: FATTEN_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on ectb. Comparison to fatten.01 (from fatten.02-v)

role.descr: Wicked witch in a candy house

example.name: reflexive
example.text: [NA delegates]-1 leveraged their positions to exact " constitutional amendment rent " and *trace*-1 fatten themselves up .

roleset.name: havnig an abundance of fat; full
roleset.note: FAT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. relation to fatten.01. (from fat.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: My husband is very fat but he is a nice guy . He works at the railway department but is truly a good person .

example.name: both args
example.text: Oreo suit twists legal system, is fat with faults
